item.title: Mermaid
item.description: Mermaid is library that helps you generate diagrams, flowcharts, and piecharts from text in a similar manner as markdown. With compose theme, you can use mermaid using a custom shortcode as follows: Sequence Diagrams Syntax 1{{< mermaid >}}2sequenceDiagram 3participant Alice 4participant Bob 5Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you? 6loop Healthcheck 7John->>John: Fight against hypochondria 8end 9Note right of John: Rational thoughts<br/>prevail... 10John-->>Alice: Great! 11John->>Bob: How about you? 12Bob-->>John: Jolly good! 13{{< /mermaid >}}Result
